FuncDef:
The ipv6-family flow command enables a BGP-Flow IPv6 address family and displays the address family view.
The undo ipv6-family command deletes the BGP-Flow IPv6 address family view.
By default, the BGP-Flow IPv6 address family is not enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before performing BGP configurations in BGP-Flow IPv6 address family view, you must run the ipv6-family flow command in the BGP view to enable the BGP-Flow IPv6 address family, and then enter the BGP-Flow IPv6 address family view.
Configuration Impact
After the ipv6-family flow command is run, the created BGP IPv6 Flow Specification route is imported to the BGP routing table.
Precautions
Running the undo ipv6-family flow command can delete all configurations from the BGP-Flow IPv6 address family view and the BGP IPv6 Flow Specification route from the BGP routing table.
